column4: ive installed u6.10 on laptop and now dwnlding the updates (169 of them!) i have the 7.04 disc but it wont install cuz the x-server breaks or something. should i be able the upgrade to 7.04 after i update 6.10? or will it break after upgrade
u will have to fix the xserver after you install the newer version
do something like dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and use the vesa driver until u can fix it
but u can get on the net via CLI, its called lynx
